thread.title: BRIEF-ION Group Investment Ltd Says Possible Cash Offer For Fidessa Group

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ION Group Investment Ltd Says Possible Cash Offer For Fidessa Group

organizations.name: brief-ion group investment ltd says possible cash offer for fidessa group

text:
April 20 (Reuters) - ION Group Investment Limited:
* POSSIBLE CASH OFFER FOR FIDESSA GROUP PLC * STATEMENT REGARDING A POSSIBLE OFFER FOR FIDESSA GROUP PLC
* APPROACHED FIDESSA‘S BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND SOME FIDESSA SHAREHOLDERS WITH PROPOSAL TO BUY FIDESSA FOR £38.703 PER SHARE IN CASH
* FIDESSA SHAREHOLDERS WOULD ALSO BE ENTITLED TO RECEIVE AND RETAIN FY FINAL AND SPECIAL DIVIDEND AMOUNTING TO 79.7 PPER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
